 int counter(int number)
          creates a counter, which counts the number of attemps until the dice equals the random number
 void playGame()
          creates a player1 and player 2 and prints who the winner is bases on the sum of the rolls
 void playUnfairGame()
          creates a scenario where it will be a tie or player1 will win
 int weightedCounter(int number)
          creates a counter, which counts the number of attemps until the WeightedDie equals the random number
